group_1.textRight: What we heard just then..@It came from that ball...right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's correct, but I don't know@whose conversation it was.

group_1.textRight: I can only assume it was...between@a little girl and her parents.
Fuuumufumumun, fumu.
Yes, I don't recognize that voice, either.

group_1.textLeft: Still, we wanted to deliver the gift of@all these treats,
and this magic was given to us@through Coordination,
so that would imply that the voice we're hearing@is the intended recipient of that gift...
It could be our [textRed:addressee].

group_1.textRight: It's certainly...highly possible.

group_1.textLeft: If that holds,
then it indicates the gift was@not for me after all,
but was left there by mistake.

group_1.textRight: More importantly, that ornament@you're holding is still glowing...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, can you hear the voices again?
...No, it doesn't look like it.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's nothing like that huge flash that@happened when we were hearing the voice.
It's just a thin beam of light stretching@really far off.
Fuumunfumu?

group_1.textLeft: Go that way...? Yes, I see.
It appears to be telling us to follow@the direction of the light.
Could you please try waving the ornament@to the left and right?

group_1.narration: *Flick flick*

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the angle of the beam has changed.
It consistently points at the same place@in the distance.

group_1.textRight: It's likely that it's telling us@where to go next.

group_1.textLeft: So if we follow it, we might find something.

group_1.textRight: It depends on what's beyond the light...
But if there's another ornament@with the same voice,
then I suppose we'll have to travel@around the space in this tree...
...to find the giver.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Let us be on our way.

group_1.textRight: Please wait.
The light only points to the location@with a straight line.
It doesn't give us the actual directions.
Considering how complicated@the streets are,
it'll be challenging to reach it@by foot.

group_1.textLeft: Why don't we fly, then?@It's a straight shot!
We're sorceresses, so we gotta be@able to fly!

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe so.
According to legend, Befana traveled@by broom.
Miss Nayuta, could you perchance be able@to magically turn your staff into a broom?

group_1.textLeft: Erm...that's quite a big ask...
Although I am a Befana, it can't be@that convenient...

group_1.narration: [textBlack: "W-we did iiiit!" ]
―Nayuta―@W-w-w-we...
―Nayuta―@We're FLYIIIIIING!
―Nayuta―@Oh my... Well, here we are.@Yozuru certainly had it right.
―Yozuru―@Yes, I'm surprised as well.
―Nayuta―@What...? Truly?@You weren't sure?
―Yozuru―@It was something I could only be sure of@if I made you my test subject...
―Nayuta―@My goodness...@Oh, I almost humiliated myself...
―Nayuta―@You ought to be a little nicer@to people, Yozuru.
―Yozuru―@I'll try to keep that in mind.
―Mikage―@Nayutan! The light pointed straight down@all of a sudden!
―Nayuta―@Oh, it must be nearby, then!
―Nayuta―@The next ornament is likely@at our destination!
―Mikage―@Let's get to it, then!@Down we gooooo!
―Sudachi―@Fumuuuuuu!

group_1.textLeft: Just as I thought, it's right here!@A new ornament!

group_1.textRight: The other one we found just@stopped glowing.

group_1.textLeft: And now there's a voice...

group_1.narration: "Hmm, what should I cook this year?"
"Dad likes spicy food lately."
"I didn't ask him, but...maybe I can make it@spicy this time...?"
"Come now, Rei-chan, you can't just go@changing the seasoning!"

group_1.textLeft: Did that make any sense to you?

group_1.textRight: Well...one thing I can say for sure is that the voices@in the conversation are the same people as before.

group_1.textLeft: It's almost as though...we're pursuing@a specific voice.
It seems the theory that this conversation involves@the proper recipients of the gift is correct.

group_1.textRight: I'm certain at least one person@we're listening to must be involved.
Fumuu?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the light's glowing again!@What should we do?

group_1.textRight: We have no other leads,@so we may as well follow it.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, and maybe, just maybe,@while we follow this conversation,
we might be able to ascertain@the recipient's name and address!

group_1.textRight: There is a chance that they'll mention personal@information during the course of the conversation.
That's it, then!
We'll just swing by the right house@and drop off the gift there.

group_1.textLeft: There we go! Our goal is in sight!

group_1.textRight: Okie-dokie! We're gonna follow that light@in search of personal info!
Fumuuuu!
